hevs.gdx2d.components.physics.utils

Class PhysicsConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.components.physics.utils.PhysicsConstants

  • public class PhysicsConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Declares useful physics simulation constants and conversion functions for the Box2D engine.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Vector2 coordMetersToPixels(Vector2 i)
      Convert a Vector2 with meter coordinates to pixels coordinates.
      static Vector2 coordPixelsToMeters(Vector2 i)
      Convert a Vector2 with pixels coordinates to meter coordinates (using the METERS_TO_PIXELS factor) to use it in Box2D.

    • Method Detail

      • coordPixelsToMeters

        public static Vector2 coordPixelsToMeters(Vector2 i)
        Convert a Vector2 with pixels coordinates to meter coordinates (using the METERS_TO_PIXELS factor) to use it in Box2D.
        Parameters:
        i - the input vector to convert. Will not be modified.
        Returns:
        the new converted vector
        See Also:
        PIXEL_TO_METERS

        Returns:
        the new converted vector
